rows.label: bf10240100_0010
rows.name: You've seen the land known as Mors, haven't you?

rows.label: bf10240100_0020
rows.name: That is what remains of my world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0030
rows.name:
Because I opened the [System:Ruby rt=Gate ]door[/System:Ruby],
many people and things...

rows.label: bf10240100_0040
rows.name: vanished into distant dimensions.

rows.label: bf10240100_0050
rows.name: All that remained were the ruins of Mors...

rows.label: bf10240100_0060
rows.name: and half of my body...

rows.label: bf10240100_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]!

rows.label: bf10240100_0080
rows.name: Your body...

rows.label: bf10240100_0090
rows.name: The other half of me exists in some other dimension.

rows.label: bf10240100_0100
rows.name: But that too will soon be gone.

rows.label: bf10240100_0110
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: bf10240100_0120
rows.name:
Because the time when my other self will perish
is drawing near.

rows.label: bf10240100_0130
rows.name: [System:Ruby rt=Father ]God[/System:Ruby][ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf10240100_0140
rows.name: I was a fool.

rows.label: bf10240100_0150
rows.name: Due to my foolishness, I lost everything.

rows.label: bf10240100_0160
rows.name:
I wished for my remaining half to disappear,
but that wish was never granted.

rows.label: bf10240100_0170
rows.name: This is my punishment...

rows.label: bf10240100_0180
rows.name: It is God's punishment for my sin...

rows.label: bf10240100_0190
rows.name: God...?

rows.label: bf10240100_0200
rows.name: There was only one thing I could do.

rows.label: bf10240100_0210
rows.name: To atone for my sin.

rows.label: bf10240100_0220
rows.name: I swore to restore this world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0230
rows.name: The first thing I created was

rows.label: bf10240100_0240
rows.name:
a molecular substance capable of
restoring deteriorated matter.

rows.label: bf10240100_0250
rows.name: That's what you know as the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf10240100_0260
rows.name: The Cloud Sea breaks down any matter it contacts,

rows.label: bf10240100_0270
rows.name:
and can reconstruct it into
the materials that once formed this world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0290
rows.name:
In this way, I gradually restored
the ruined world bit by bit.

rows.label: bf10240100_0300
rows.name: Next, I performed the regeneration of life.

rows.label: bf10240100_0310
rows.name:
Particles containing the memories
of all once-living creatures...

rows.label: bf10240100_0320
rows.name:
I scattered what you call Core Crystals
Into the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf10240100_0330
rows.name:
The Core Crystals I released bonded with
the molecular structure of the Cloud Sea,

rows.label: bf10240100_0340
rows.name: and formed the cores of new life.

rows.label: bf10240100_0350
rows.name:
These life cores eventually
developed into tiny organisms...

rows.label: bf10240100_0360
rows.name:
They transformed into Divine Beasts,
which gradually grew larger and larger.

rows.label: bf10240100_0370
rows.name:
Eventually, using the genetic information
they contained,

rows.label: bf10240100_0380
rows.name: the Divine Beasts created pure organisms.

rows.label: bf10240100_0390
rows.name: The produced life forms, over a long period of time,

rows.label: bf10240100_0400
rows.name: became new humans.

rows.label: bf10240100_0410
rows.name: So that's how we came to exist in this world...

rows.label: bf10240100_0420
rows.name: But I didn't trust the world born through this process.

rows.label: bf10240100_0430
rows.name: Would it not repeat the same mistakes?

rows.label: bf10240100_0440
rows.name: Would someone like me appear once more?

rows.label: bf10240100_0450
rows.name:
To eliminate these concerns,
I implemented one final plan.

rows.label: bf10240100_0460
rows.name: That is what Blades are,

rows.label: bf10240100_0470
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ah!

rows.label: bf10240100_0480
rows.name: known as Ousia, Logos, and Pneuma...

rows.label: bf10240100_0490
rows.name: the Trinity Processor was the core of that.

rows.label: bf10240100_0500
rows.name:
However, Ousia had vanished during
a space-time displacement event.

rows.label: bf10240100_0510
rows.name:
I entrusted the remaining Logos and Pneuma
with overseeing the Blades.

rows.label: bf10240100_0520
rows.name: Metsu and Homura...

rows.label: bf10240100_0530
rows.name: That's what you two are called now.

rows.label: bf10240100_0540
rows.name: Pneuma... that's who I am...

rows.label: bf10240100_0550
rows.name: 'Overseeing'?

rows.label: bf10240100_0560
rows.name: The Core Crystals at the center of each Blade

rows.label: bf10240100_0570
rows.name:
have a transmission function that sends data to Logos
and Pneuma - including environmental adaptation data

rows.label: bf10240100_0580
rows.name:
and biological information from their bonded humans,
about the selection pressures of the outside world,

rows.label: bf10240100_0590
rows.name:
and the biological status of their bonded human,
all of which is continuously collected and analyzed.

rows.label: bf10240100_0600
rows.name: The transmitted data accumulates,

rows.label: bf10240100_0610
rows.name:
and new evolutionary code is
sent back to the Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf10240100_0620
rows.name:
This returned evolutionary code
creates new, more evolved Blades,

rows.label: bf10240100_0630
rows.name:
These Blades eventually transform
into Divine Beasts,

rows.label: bf10240100_0640
rows.name: and go on to produce new lifeforms...

rows.label: bf10240100_0650
rows.name: I created a cycle of life's memories.

rows.label: bf10240100_0660
rows.name: What a grand design...

rows.label: bf10240100_0670
rows.name: It's a tale that boggles the mind...

rows.label: bf10240100_0680
rows.name:
So we were all born through
this cycle of repeating life...

rows.label: bf10240100_0690
rows.name: at the cost of the original world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0700
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: bf10240100_0710
rows.name: But there were also a few survivors.

rows.label: bf10240100_0720
rows.name: You must have seen them in the land of Mors too.

rows.label: bf10240100_0730
rows.name: The figures of people who managed to survive.

rows.label: bf10240100_0740
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ahh...!

rows.label: bf10240100_0750
rows.name:
Those monsters...
were they originally human?

rows.label: bf10240100_0760
rows.name:
Originally, Core Crystals were designed
to replace human brain cells.

rows.label: bf10240100_0780
rows.name:
The crystallized ambition
of those who sought immortality.

rows.label: bf10240100_0790
rows.name: So that's what they became in the end...

rows.label: bf10240100_0800
rows.name:
But that also became the starting point
for creating Blades and Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf10240100_0810
rows.name: Whether we see that as a foundation or a sacrifice...

rows.label: bf10240100_0820
rows.name: The answer is up to each individual... huh.

rows.label: bf10240100_0830
rows.name: We who were born that way...

rows.label: bf10240100_0840
rows.name: Did we develop as you had hoped?

rows.label: bf10240100_0850
rows.name: What do you think?

rows.label: bf10240100_0860
rows.name: For me... very...

rows.label: bf10240100_0870
rows.name:
Yes...
these visions you all experienced earlier,

rows.label: bf10240100_0880
rows.name: are also aspects of your hearts.

rows.label: bf10240100_0890
rows.name: As well as that man... Marveni...
